original_text: For thus saith the Lord; Behold, they whose judgment was not to drink of the cup have assuredly drunken; and art thou he that shall altogether go unpunished? thou shalt not go unpunished, but thou shalt surely drink of it.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 보라 술잔을 마시는 습관이 없는 자도 반드시 마시겠거든 네가 형벌을 온전히 면하겠느냐 면하지 못하리니 너는 반드시 마시리라

sentences.original_text: they whose judgment was not to drink of the cup
sentences.korean_translation: 그 잔을 마시지 않기로 판단된 자들도

sentences.original_text: and art thou he that shall altogether go unpunished?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 전혀 벌받지 않을 자냐?

sentences.original_text: but thou shalt surely drink of it
